'''The Shimmering Voyage Vol. 2''' is the upcoming Version 2.0 Commemorative soundtrack album of ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

The album's three discs feature a total of 56 soundtracks produced by the [[HOYO-MiX]] team. It will include music from the game's animated cutscenes such as the clash between rebels and the Raiden Shogun in [[Chapter II]]'s [[The Omnipresent God]].

It was first announced on July 2, 2022, during the [[Special Program]] for [[Version 2.8]]. The release date of the album was not given.
